OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD SICKLE CELL AND THALASSAEMIA FOUNDATION

Desc.entry: A registered charity that provides information, advice, education, support and advocacy to individuals with the disorders, their families and carers. Delivers awareness raising presentations free of charge to groups and organisations. Facilitates support groups for individuals and carers.

ContactName.entry: Carol Jarrett/Nighat Khan, Community Development Workers

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Thurs 9am-5pm, Fri 9am-4.30pm (office times); Meet 3rd Tues in the month at 5.30pm (except Aug)
